node.title: Burst pipe cuts off water supply in Porirua
node.description: A burst water main has cut off water supply to a large section of Porirua this morning.
node.content:
["A burst water main has cut off water supply to a large section of Porirua.", "", "
A water pipe has burst at Parumoana Street, Porirua on 11 November, 2022. Photo: Facebook / Wellington Water
", "Residents and businesses between Te Rauparaha Park and the top of Takapūwāhia Reserve have been without water supply since about 8am while repairs are underway.", "Wellington Water hopes to have it repaired by 2pm.", "Two water tankers are arriving to supply water to the area, one of which will be posted on Awarua Street near the Elsdon Foodmarket.", "Tītahi Bay residents are also being asked to conserve water,"]
